article_title: UN says more than 10,000 women killed in Gaza since October.
sentence: UN  says  more  than  10,000  women  killed  in  Gaza  since  October.

article_title: UN says more than 10,000 women killed in Gaza since October.
sentence: More  than  10,000  women  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  the  start  of  the  war,  according  to  a  new  report  by  UN  Women  .

article_title: UN says more than 10,000 women killed in Gaza since October.
sentence: Of  the  10,000  women  killed,  the  aid  agency  says,  6,000  women  have  left  an  estimated  19,000  orphan  children  behind.

article_title: UN says more than 10,000 women killed in Gaza since October.
sentence: As  we  reported  earlier  today,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  said  more  than  33,843  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  October.
